resources.string: Sandra Perez is an employee with more than 8 years of experience in the company who is characterized by her companionship
Raúl Rodriguez is a new operator who shows interest in learning and improving day by day
Martha Nielsen is a time traveler, known as EVA, you must arrive before ADAN stacks!!
Bayron is an excellent professional who plays for the companys soccer team, he is the top scorer of the tournament

My name is Juan José Gallego Mesa, I am an electronic engineer from the University of Antioquia and a Telecommunications engineer from the Metropolitan Technological Institute, I have a specialization in formulation and evaluation of projects from this same institution and different seminars and diplomas in pedagogy. I am passionate about software development and teaching from a very young age, having the opportunity to apply my knowledge in institutions such as: Seguros Sura, the national learning service-SENA, the Medellín metro and the Medellín secretariat of education.
